title: Enroll Customer in Loyalty Program
description: At checkout, a store associate asks a customer if they would like to join the free loyalty program.

tasks.description: Briefly explain the benefits of the loyalty program (e.g., 'You'll earn points on every purchase').
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer understands the value and agrees to sign up.

tasks.description: Enter the customer's name and email address into the POS loyalty enrollment form.
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate accurately captures the customer's information.

tasks.description: Complete the enrollment. The system links the new loyalty account to the current transaction so the customer earns points immediately.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer is successfully enrolled and receives points for their first purchase.
